chunks.chunk_text: Savannah,great.所以呢,同情家族如果有興趣這個聽聽Savannah的Let's get savvy,殺去看世界這個podcast,剛Savannah就是介紹,其實他們的這個除了學英文的部分以外,其實還有很多很多的系列是跟我們的這個文化還有旅遊,還有他們的這個不同的世界觀點有關,然後他們跟這個他們的series,This is Taiwan,是主要是給外國人,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 給外籍人士去聽,更了解台灣,其實對我們來說,如果要去練習音聽,或者是要練習從自己身邊的事情開始吸收的話,其實Savannah的這個This is Taiwan這個series,其實就非常非常棒,就可以讓大家去從自己熟悉的這個文化,還有一些這些習俗來開始聽。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以謝謝大家,記得要去Apple Podcast,Spotify,或是KKBOX,或任何的podcast播放器去找,Let's get savvy,然後去試聽他們的This is Taiwan的系列,非常非常好,謝謝Savannah。

chunks.chunk_text: 自己喜歡的趕快訂閱起來囉。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以我也問他說,你是不是morning sickness?What's wrong with you?Are you pregnant?And he said no, he just feels sick the whole day。所以他還不到中午呢,他就說他受不了,他一直很想吐,他就請病假了。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So apart from the fact that today is back to work day for most of us in Taiwan,but what about your colleagues that took sick leave,that took maternity leave,or those who are returning from their holidays?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So tonight that's what we're going to be talking about.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So to start off,這邊有幾個tips,we have a few tips,for you to think about how to welcome your colleague,or your peers,whoever it is,back to work.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: This is colleagues and peers,this is not for like bosses and such,because that takes a little bit more finesse,如果是長官的話呢,我們就要更加注意我們的選字啦,更加注意我們的用詞喔。But this is for colleagues and peers,so this is very generic,這就比較通常在使用的喔。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So for compliments and for anything nice you say to somebody,please make sure it's specific。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So you have to be specific,所以外國人很常就是wow I love your skirt today,your shoes are fantastic,please tell me where I can get them。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 然後換個字好像也沒有打到痛處對不對,所以這種稱讚就不痛不癢,好像很敷衍。So think about this,when you say something nice to a person,you have to make it specific,那這個specific也會代表說你有在觀察這些人,有跟他們的很親密感,你才會觀察他,你不屑於他,if you don't like this person,you don't care,you wouldn't care about giving a compliment,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: making a specific positive remark,right?Think about that,so from making it specific,you have to mention what they were doing and why they were away,所以呢,他們不在的理由,oh you know we missed you from your big trip to US,ok,所以特別裡面要包含了什麼呢,就是對方做了些什麼,去的哪裡。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 或者是,比如說去生小孩,我們就可以說去延展他的家庭啦,去增強報國啦,增產報國啦,這種等等的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So make sure you also share something that could help them get back on the horse,get back to the work mode,to know what people are doing at work,so you are more connected,ok?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: Or, next tip,ask how their break was,then use that knowledge to write a personalized message,ok?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 客製化你的這個personalized message,要客製化這個訊息,你給你的同事的這個訊息,就是說,you find out,ok,so you know Petty's away on holiday helping somebody,ok?And then,so Petty's first day back to work,so what I'll do is I'll write an email to him or I'll text message him and say welcome back and hope you had a fruitful trip helping out your friend,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: and you know,we hope to continue working with you,or we hope that,you know,to see you more on the project that we were working on before you were away,something like that,ok?So make it personalized,make it personalized.And of course,the final tip,you have to keep your message positive,ok,positive.That is the only thing in English that I feel that
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: I think it's very difficult to not be positive,ok,because of the cultural background.In Mandarin Chinese,a lot of descriptions of things can't sound critical if you use the wrong tone,ok?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: In English,most of the time,if you stay away from words with negative connotation,通常的那種負面詞,只要避免它,基本上多用正面詞就好了,就比較沒事,ok?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So the four tips for welcoming your colleagues back to work.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So we start off with a few examples here.To start off,these are the basic examples,and I'm going to break it down for you guys.The first example sentence.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 因為我們很想念你,不是說我們很想念你,you know,like 負面的,ok?沒有辦法這樣想念人,ok?So we missed you,ok?So we missed you about what?And we are so glad you are back.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: In the office,we are so glad you're back.那如果還要更具體的話呢,可能就是,you know,we are so glad you're back on the team,back on the project,ok?You're back and,you know,to lend us a helping hand on the project,ok?We missed you,ok?Or everybody missed you,right?這通常就會聽到,所以它有三段喔,we missed you,我們很想念你,so missed you 不是說我們不需要你,而是
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我們很想念你.Next,it's great to have you back in the office.So it's great to something.It's great.非常非常非常超級無敵霹靂的高興你回來了.To have you back in the office.It's great to have you back in the office.Next,we hope you had a great time and we are happy to have you back,ok?So we hope you had a great time.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我們真的希望你當時玩得那麼開心,那個很開心,對不對?And we are happy to have you back.所以兩段是,你快樂,我們也快樂,然後你回來了,我們也很快樂,大概是這樣子的概念.We hope you had a great time.So this is more for people who's on travels,I suppose.Yeah,if you think about it,ok?So we hope you had a great time.Wish somebody who had a great time.Very nice.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: And you can mix and match these elements.如果你平常就不是很善於表達或善於講一些這種可能你不常講的這種讚美話啦,或者是祝福語啦.It's ok,you can start today.Alright,start with your international colleagues,start today.Alright,so we missed you,we're glad you're back.It's great to have you back in the office.It's great to have you back on the team.It's great to have you something.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: So we can say,we missed you and we're happy to have you back.We hope you had a great time and we're so glad you're back.You can mix and match these phrases all you like.其實都不會錯的,主要呢,就是表達你的善意.So just be nice to your colleagues and peers.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_通勤學英語Live - 開工如何歡迎同事歸來Welcome your colleagues back to work 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's great to have you back in the office.
